Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS
REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Relates to hazard duty pay for essential work performed in accordance with a state emergency disaster declaration
Summary: Provides for hazard duty pay of an additional twenty-five hundred dollars for essential work performed in accordance with a state emergency disaster declaration.
LawCode: Amd ยง130, Civ Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil service law, in relation to hazard duty pay for essential work performed in accordance with a state emergency disaster declaration
